Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class CarriersController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.CarriersController
@Controller public class CarriersController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with carriers.
Since:
3/22/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showCarriersList

      @RequestMapping("/carriers") public String showCarriersList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the carriers to the "carriers" model and redirects user to the carriers page. If a user is logged in as a carrier, the detials of their carrier is added to the page.
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /carriers

    • showAddCarrierExcel

      @RequestMapping("/uploadcarrier") public String showAddCarrierExcel(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /uploadcarrier page when clicking "Upload an excel file" button in the carriers section of AdminTry
      Parameters:
      model - used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      /uploadcarrier

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editcarrier/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that carrier to a form and redirects the user to that update form.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the carrier to be edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /update/update-carrier

    • viewCarrierShipments

      @GetMapping("/viewcarriershipments/{id}") public String viewCarrierShipments(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the shipments of that carrier to the shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the carrier for the shipments to be added to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /shipments

    • viewCarrierBids

      @GetMapping("/viewcarrierbids/{id}") public String viewCarrierBids(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the bids of that carrier to the bids page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the carrier for the bids to be added to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /bids

    • viewCarrier

      @GetMapping("/viewcarrier/{id}") public String viewCarrier(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found shows the carrier on the carrier page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the carrier to be viewed
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /carriers

    • updateCarrier

      @PostMapping("/updatecarrier/{id}") public String updateCarrier(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Carriers carrier, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates a carrier to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form. If there are no errors, the carrier is updated in the carriersRepository. and the user is redirected to /carriers If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-carriers page.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the carrier to be updated
      carrier - Stores information on the carrier that is being updated
      result - Checks user inputs to ensure they are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /carriers or /update/update-carriers

    • getUserFromCarrier

      public static User getUserFromCarrier(Carriers carrier)
      Receives and carrier object and finds the corresponding user object associated
      Parameters:
      carrier - holds the carrier object
      Returns:
      result

    • showCarrierEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editcarriers/{id}") public String showCarrierEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds the required attributes to the model to render the edit carriers page
      Parameters:
      id - of the carrier being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /index or /edit/edit-carrier

    • carrierUpdateForm

      @PostMapping("edit-carrier/{id}") public String carrierUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, User user, Carriers carrier, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a carrier and user object that gets validated and saved to the repository through the edit carriers page
      Parameters:
      id - of the user calling the method
      user - holds the user object being created
      carrier - holds the new carrier object passed by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /edit/edit-carriers or redirect: + redirectLocation

    • showCarrierAddForm

      @GetMapping("/addcarrier") public String showCarrierAddForm(User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to render the add carrier page to the model
      Parameters:
      user - user object being passed to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-carrier

    • carrierAddForm

      @PostMapping("addcarrierform") public String carrierAddForm(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String carrierName, String scac, boolean ltl, boolean ftl, String pallets, String weight, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a carrier and user object from the add carrier page. Validates and saves the new user and carrier
      Parameters:
      userForm - holds the user object
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      carrierName - holds the carrier name of the new carrier
      scac - holds the scac of the new carrier
      ltl - holds the ltl of the new carrier
      ftl - holds the ftl of the new carrier
      pallets - holds the pallets of the new carrier
      weight - holds the weight of the new carrier
      Returns:
      /add/add-carrier or redirect: + redirectLocation
